data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for OUTCOME OF THE BOARD MEETING HELD ON 25TH SEPTEMBER 2025
data.news_body:
Intimation under SEBI (Listing Obligation & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015

Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligation & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 Board has inter-alia considered and approved the following as recommended by Nomination & Remuneration Committee:

a. Appointment of Mr. Saurabh Maheshwari as Managing Director of the Company w.e.f. 14th October 2025. The brief profile of Mr. Saurabh Maheshwari is enclosed herewith as Annexure A.
b. Appointment of Mr. Vishal Sekhani as an Executive Director of the Company w.e.f. 14th October 2025. The brief profile of Mr.Vishal Sekhani is enclosed herewith as Annexure B.

The meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company commenced at 12.30 p.m and concluded at 2.30 p.m.

data.caption: Resignation Of Managing Dircetor
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of LODR we hereby inform you that Mr. Harsh Vardhan Bassi (DIN 00102941) has resigned from the post of Managing Director with effect from 13th October 2025 due to personal reasons.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Managing Director
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of LODR we hereby inform you that Mr. Harsh Vardhan Bassi (DIN 00102941) has resigned from the post of Managing Director from Board of the Company with effect from 13th October 2025 due to personal reasons.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for OUTCOME OF THE BOARD MEETING HELD ON 12TH AUGUST 2025
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. 12th August 2025 at the Unit no 21 to 25 2nd Floor Orient House 3A Udyog Nagar Goregaon (West) Mumbai - 400062 inter-alia to transact the following business:

1. Intimation under SEBI (Listing Obligation & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015

Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligation & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 Board has inter-alia considered and approved the following:

a. Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June 2025 and the same is enclosed as Annexure -I.
b. Limited Review on the Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June 2025 and the same is enclosed as Annexure - II.

The meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company commenced at 12.00 noon and concluded at 13.45 p.m.

data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligation & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 Board has inter-alia considered and approved the following:a. Approved amendment of object clause of Memorandum of Association (MOA) of the Company.b. Approved adoption of amended Articles of Association (AOA) as per provisions of Companies Act, 2013.c.    Extra Ordinary General Meeting of the Company will be held on 8th November, 2024 through video conferencing or other audio video means.The meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company commenced at 4.00 p.m. and concluded at 4.35 p.m.We request you to take the above information on your records.

data.caption: Clarification On Price Movement
data.news_body: Clarification on price Movement

data.caption: Clarification sought from Pioneer Embroideries Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Pioneer Embroideries Ltd on September 12, 2024 with reference to significant movement in price, in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for OUTCOME OF THE BOARD MEETING HELD ON 11TH FEBRUARY, 2023
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. Saturday, 11th February, 2023 at the Unit no 21 to 25, 2nd Floor, Orient House, 3A Udyog Nagar, Goregaon (West), Mumbai - 400062 inter-alia to transact the following business:

1. Approved the Un-audited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Third Quarter and Nine Months ended on 31st December, 2022, which is enclosed herewith as Annexure -I

2. Limited Review Report dated 11th February, 2023 by the Statutory Auditors in respect of Un-audited Standalone & Consolidated Limited Review Report for the Quarter and Nine Months ended on 31st December, 2022, is enclosed herewith as Annexure - II

The meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company commenced at 11.30 a.m. and concluded at 12.40 p.m.

We request you to take the above information on your records.

We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. 14th November, 2022 at the Unit no 21 to 25, 2nd Floor, Orient House, 3A Udyog Nagar, Goregaon (West), Mumbai - 400062 inter-alia to transact the following business:

a. Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results and Statement of Assets and Liabilities of the Company for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2022 is enclosed as Annexure -I

b. Limited Review on the Unaudited Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2022 is enclosed as Annexure - II.

The meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company commenced at 12.00 Noon and concluded at 13.30 p.m. We request you to take the above information on your records.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, as amended, we would like to inform you that subsequent to the declaration of Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2021, the Company is organizing an 'Earnings Conference Call' on Friday, 12th November, 2021 at 1.30 P.M. (IST).
The details of the conference call and presentation to be made to Analyst/Investors during the conference call, are enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Discrepancies In Standalone Financial Results As On 31.03.2021.
data.news_body:
We refer to your email dated 27th May, 2021 pertaining to discrepancies in Standalone Financial Results as on 31.03.2021. Please find enclosed herewith revised Audited Standalone Financial Results, after corrected typo error in Net Profit/(Loss) figure in Result PDF for Quarter end is Rs.1088.53 Lakh instead of Rs.1083.53 Lakh.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated 20th May, 2021and 21st May, 2021, pertaining to intimation and presentation for an 'Analyst/ Investor Conference Call' held on Tuesday, 25th May, 2021 at 2.00 P.M. (IST), pursuant to Regulation 30 and 46(2)(o) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements), Regulations, 2015, as amended, we inform you that the audio call recording of the Company's Analyst/Investors meet to discuss on Post Results (Q4 & FY 2020-21) is available on Company's website.
The link to access the said audio recording is: https://www.pelhakoba.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/Investor-Meet-Audio-Recording.mp4.
This is for your information and records.
